creditline: Gift of Tamara and Michael Root
description: large round platter on low foot; design is three airplanes viewed face-on flying over corn plants; largest plane at L dropping yellow spray over corn; white ground with concentric brushstrokes, centered at TR; hanging wire on back
markings: bottom at C: yellow bird perched on circle K makers mark; paper sticker label on back: Kip O\'Krongly
medium: Earthenware with slips, underglaze, hand cut stencils, sgraffito, and terra sigillata, single fired to cone 04 in oxidation
title: Crop Duster Platter
